channel.title: Tops on ZJUT VIS
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on ZJUT VIS

item.description: Bio ã€€I’m currently an associate professor at College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University of Technology, Hangzhou, China. I received B.Sc. in computer science and technology (2010), and Ph.D. degree in January, 2016 under the supervision of Ronghua Liang. During my Ph.D study, I studied and worked as a visiting intern at Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology under Prof. Huamin Qu’s supervision from February 2013 to July 2013, a research intern at Internet Graphics Group, Microsoft Research Asia with Yingcai Wu from July 2013 to January 2015, and a visiting intern at The Institute for Visualization and Interactive Systems headed by Thomas Ertl at the University of Stuttgart from July 2015 to December 2015.
